ClassMembers.name: DataStorage
ClassMembers.summary: Class responsible for storing and managing loaded image data in a thread-safe manner. It maintains an internal dictionary of ImageDataContainer objects, indexed by file path, and provides controlled access for adding, retrieving, clearing, and listing stored images.

ClassMembers.name: ToolProcessor
ClassMembers.summary: Class responsible for running enabled image-processing tools on all stored images. It retrieves images from the DataStorage and applies each active ToolBase instance from the ToolsManager in a parallelized manner to improve performance.

ClassMembers.name: ImageDataContainer
ClassMembers.summary: Class representing image data loaded from the file system. It stores the source file path and optionally the raw byte content of the image. Used as the primary data container for image processing operations.

ClassMembers.name: ImageLoader
ClassMembers.summary: Static class responsible for asynchronously loading image files from disk and storing them into a instance. It reads raw image bytes and wraps them into objects, making them available for later processing.

ClassMembers.name: ToolBase
ClassMembers.summary: Abstract base class for all image-processing tools.

ClassMembers.name: ToolsManager
ClassMembers.summary: Class responsible for managing all image-processing tools in the system. Provides functionality to register new tools and access the collection of registered tools.

ClassMembers.name: WatermarkTool
ClassMembers.summary: Tool that applies a watermark image onto target images. Supports configurable watermark image path, opacity, and position. Inherits from .

ClassMembers.name: ScaleTool
ClassMembers.summary: Tool that proportionally scales an image based on a scale factor. The scale factor can range from 0 to 2. Inherits from .

ClassMembers.name: ResizeTool
ClassMembers.summary: Tool that resizes an image to specific width and height values. Width and height must be greater than zero and within reasonable bounds. Inherits from .

ClassMembers.name: FlipTool
ClassMembers.summary: Tool that flips an image horizontally, vertically, or both. Inherits from .

ClassMembers.name: BrightnessTool
ClassMembers.summary: Tool that adjusts the brightness of an image. Brightness multiplier must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 3. Inherits from .

ClassMembers.name: TabContext
ClassMembers.summary: Represents the context of a tab in the application, managing both image storage and associated image-processing tools. Provides methods to execute tools and validate their states.

ClassMembers.name: ActionPanel
ClassMembers.summary: UserControl that provides actions for importing, processing, and exporting images. Connects with and to manage images and tools.

ClassMembers.name: PreviewPanel
ClassMembers.summary: UserControl that displays a list of imported images and shows a preview of the selected image. Integrates with to apply tools and retrieve images.

ClassMembers.name: ToolsPanel
ClassMembers.summary: UserControl that manages tool settings and interactions for the current tab. Connects with and to enable/disable tools and update previews in real-time.

ClassMembers.name: MainWindow
ClassMembers.summary: The main window of the LIMS application. Manages the initialization and wiring of all panels, including , , and .

ClassMembers.name: HeaderPanel
ClassMembers.summary: UserControl that represents the header section of the LIMS application interface. Provides buttons for accessing preferences and zoom controls. Handles opening of the preferences menu and placeholder methods for zooming in and out.

ClassMembers.name: Logger
ClassMembers.summary: Static class used for thread-safe logging. Writes timestamped log entries into per-day log files under the application Log directory.
